metadata.synopsis: AD for Skarai Bervos, the information broker in the alley outside of the Baldurs Mouth Gazette building
metadata.how_to_trigger: Walk by the alley on the south side of the Baldurs Mouth building, approx coords 85, 41, -68.

1.speaker: Strange Beggar Lumbar
1.text: Oi, guv - I've more scoops for you.
